attributes.action: cancel the purchase of the Airbus A400M and get the C-130J Super Hercules.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Airbus A400M transport is overbudget and long overdue. The C-130J Super Hercules is already in production. More components would be made in the UK than with the A400M. It was a political acquisition made to keep other European countries happy, against the wishes of the MOD.
